sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; const StrengthSection = () => { return (

STRENGTHNING OUR PRODUCTS FOR

Ceramic Industry

Huge quantities of quartz powder are used in ceramic bodies and glazes. They act as a "skeleton" in porcelain bodies. They raise the thermal expansion and make it easier to fit glazes.

Paints and Coating

High purity silica contributes critical performance properties such as brightness and reflectance, colour consistency, and oil absorption. In architectural paints, silica fillers improve tint retention, durability, and resistance to dirt, mildew, cracking and weathering.

Glass Industry

The high-quality quartz components contribute to the transparency, strength, and thermal resistance of glass, ensuring it meets the stringent standards required for various applications, from windows to specialty glass products.

Construction

Artificial quartz stone and pebbles, contribute to the durability, strength, and aesthetic appeal of various construction applications, ranging from countertops to decorative elements.

); }; export default StrengthSection;
